job.title: Jr. Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtFull Job DescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtSavi is a leading financial technology startup based in DC that is working to solve the student debt crisis Our mission is to help the 46 million student loan borrowers better understand their debt find federal forgiveness programs and enroll Were looking for people who have the desire to build meaningful products and the drive to do great work as part of a team Savi has been featured in the New York Times TIME and Inc and recently the company completed our Series A funding round Our clients include Fortune 500 companies financial institutions and the nations largest membership groups who use our platform to help their employees and members better manage their student loans and save moneyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIdeal candidates are proactive accountable people focused on continuous learning and growth to push themselves and our business forward We offer a competitive salary benefits and a generous telework policyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtOwn features through all phases of the software development cycleltligtltligtBuild monitoring reporting and dashboard tools for internal stakeholdersltligtltligtContribute and improve APIs that will be consumed internally and by strategic business partnersltligtltligtBuild custom web applications andor microsites from design through deploymentltligtltligtUse a number of technologieslanguages not limited to React PHP Laravel Python MySQL AWSltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience with backend web frameworks like Django Express or LaravelltligtltligtWorking knowledge of a frontend JS framework like React Angular or VueltligtltligtSkilled with markup languages like HTML and CSSltligtltligtExperience with version control systems like GitltligtltligtLove tools technologies and frameworks but are first and foremost pragmaticltligtltligtWilling to wear many hats and collaborate with technical and nontechnical team membersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtSavi provides equal employment opportunities EEO to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin age disability or genetics In addition to federal law requirements Savi complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment including recruiting hiring placement promotion termination layoff recall transfer leaves of absence compensation and trainingltemgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
